https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/13SyLF3NsOeaGGipAGCnrcPVwx4.jpg Sketches of a Spanish circus made by Richard Williams in 1953 come to life. Williams began the project at the age of 20 and finished it when he was 77. It premiered at the Pordenone Silent Film Festival in 2010. Circus Drawings
